resources.string: Tour Guide
Restaurants
Parks
Malls
Museums
Lusin
Lusin serves its guests enticing Armenian specialities renowned for its distinctive aromas and flavourful preparations.
Olaya St | 2nd floor intersection with Tahlya St, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
Nozomi
Nozomi brings an exciting and unique dining experience from Knightsbridge, London to the heart of Riyadh.
Dabbab Street, Riyadh 12223, Saudi Arabia
Piatto
One of the best Italian restaurants and great atmosphere.

Al-Najdiyah Village
The restaurant was built to represent an old traditional mud house, which was the traditional way in Najd area years ago.

Maharaja East by Vineet
The most authentic Indian Resturant in Riyadh

National Museum
It shows that history is only told from one view. The museum has a great flow from the beginning of time through to modern day.

King Abdulaziz Historical Center
About detailed history how and who and all where important people in development of middle East.
King Saud Street, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Saqer-Aljazirah Aviation Museum
Its very well maintained and good collection of aircrafts.

King Abdullah Park
Nice place for relaxation with the family especially on weekends.

Wadi Hanifah
Its quite attractive place placed beside with DAM which usually fill with rain water
West of Al Diriyah, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Old Diraiyah
A great place to wander around and get a taste of the old Riyadh.
Thumeiry Street, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Salam Park
The biggest park in Riyadh. Contains a big lake and a lot of playing and seatings areas.
Riyadh 12651, Saudi Arabia
Al Bujairi square
Its a wonderfully set up area a the far North-West of Riyadh.
King Faisal Rd, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Kingdom Centre Tower
It is the tallest tower in Saudi Arabia.
King Fahad Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Al Nakheel Mall
There is many large shops for brands. And there is many cafes
